text: I’m not sure if this has been answered before, but I was wondering if it is at all possible to nest field groups deeper than 3 levels in custom modules.

Thanks for getting into the details here, <@UQERM7BLY>! I’d like to pull in my colleague <@U8THBCFC4> on this.
Katie, I think what Kieran describes isn’t possible (please correct me if I’m wrong), but it sounds like he may have some good feedback for you.

Hi Kieran! Very good question. “Style fields” aren’t available yet, but it’s something we’re working on. When that’s released, developers would be able to define the style controls that appear in the style tab, similar to fields that you’d use to build out controls in the ‘Content’ tab of custom modules.
This is very much still in development, so I can’t guarantee anything at this point, but that’s the plan right now!
